response.overview: "Transmissions" reimagines visual music for the digital age, transforming sound into evolving imagery shaped by generative processes. The visuals and audio originate from the same source, with the signal rendered as abstract forms and fleeting faces against a black backdrop. Inspired by mid-century pioneers of visual music, the piece explores sensory overlap and the tension between structure and chaos, inviting viewers to contemplate how sound might be seen.
response.tagline: A new transmission of the visual music tradition
response.title: Transmissions
